instructions.name: initialize
docs: Instruction which initializes the GlobalState account for the staking information

instructions.name: initializeRewardState
docs: Instruction which initializes the RewardState account

instructions.name: stake
docs: Instruction which allows a user to stake a Nyan for a _stake_duration_

instructions.name: unstake
docs: Instruction which allows a user to unstake their Nyan before or after the
_stake_duration_ has passed. If the user unstakes before their mission has ended then

instructions.name: unstakeWithNewTokenAccount
docs: Created this instruction to tackle a issue which few user were facing when the user used MagicEden v1 contract  and closes the token account.
MagicEden v1 contract changes the authority of ATA and assign to new purchaser wallet so when user closes the token account after staking.
We are not able to fetch same token as that was associated with some different wallet
Generally its recommended not to change authority of ATA of a token account to other. Its was corrected in new MagicEden v2 contract.
Will be removed after checking it is not being used anymore.

accounts.name: oldTokenAccount
docs: CHECK Not dangerous as we don't read and write from this account

instructions.name: addMetadata
docs: Instruction to create and add Nyan rarity metadata for a Nyan NFT

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: You are not authorized to call this action.

errors.name: TokenAmountError
errors.msg: Either the token account passed is not a NFT or user does'nt holds this token

errors.name: TokenOwnerError
errors.msg: Token account passed isn't hold by owner

errors.name: TokenMintError
errors.msg: Token account passed and Mint passed aren't related

errors.name: NyanMetadataAuthority
errors.msg: The passed account authority does'nt match with main authority of nyan metadata protocol

errors.name: NotAValidMint
errors.msg: The mint trying to update is not valid

errors.name: NotValid
errors.msg: The mint passed is not valid

errors.name: MintMismatch
errors.msg: The token account and mint passed aren't related

errors.name: TokenOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: The owner of the token account passed and the signer does'nt match

errors.name: AtaDoesnotMatch
errors.msg: The ATA passed and ATA saved inside PDA doesn't match

errors.name: StakerKeyMismatch
errors.msg: The Staker Reward Owner and Staker key does'nt Match

errors.name: LimitReached
errors.msg: The staking reward limit has been reached can't stake
